content: ALL FAKE NEWS! Trump told me it is all fake and he knows best. He is the BEST Businessman on Earth. I know this because he told me so. He makes the BEST deals. After all he is the only one that can bring back the Coal Industry. He can and will force everyone to abandon wind, solar, water, and Natural gas and return to this new invention he has created. That is right “Clean Coal” as it can be burned without polluting the air and waters of our country. Oh wait a minute. That’s right he cannot even operate a business without going bankrupt. He cannot get any bank loans in the U S, Europe, and even China. He hides his Tax returns. Did not he say he was for Fracking and getting more oil and NATURAL GAS? He told me that the rising sea levels was due to storms as he has had to for a third time request permission raise his sea level again in Ireland at his golf course. Is it my imagination or is it getting hotter outside. Why is it I can navigate the Artic Ocean without an Ice breaker? What happen to that Glacier I used to see on my Alaskan cruise? It’s gone. I took a picture and Trump called me and said my picture lied. The Glacier was still there. I just could not see it. Why do I feel like I am in the “Twilight Zone” or “Outer Limits”.
